author: Tom Ciccotta, Tom Ciccotta
title: U. of Texas Dean: Saying 'Chinese Virus' Inspires Hate Crimes
description: A University of Texas at Austin dean argued this week that the term "Chinese virus" is inspiring hateful acts against Asian-American students on campus.
content:
A University of Texas at Austin dean argued this week that the term “Chinese virus” is inspiring hateful acts against Asian-American students on campus.
According to a report by the College Fix, Dean Ann Huff Stevens of the University of Texas at Austin made… [+1694 chars]
